data.title: Potomac River Clinic
data.meta_description: Potomac River Clinic, formerly known as Chattering Children, is a non-profit organization co-located in The River School, which serves children with hearing loss in the greater Washington, DC area.
data.meta_site_name: Private School in Washington DC - The River School
data.text:
Potomac River Clinic (formerly known as Chattering Children) is a non-profit organization co-located in The River School, which serves the greater Washington, DC area. Potomac River Clinic provides children with hearing loss and their families a range of services, including auditory-verbal therapy, hearing aid and cochlear implant programming, psycho-educational assessments, educational supports, speech-language therapy and other services. Potomac River Clinic's goal is to optimize the outcomes of young children with hearing loss throughout the region.

Services:

audiological evaluations & device programming

auditory-verbal therapy

speech-language pathology

occupational therapy

psycho-educational assessments

teletherapy
